title: 2000/19/EC: Commission Decision of 9 December 1999 amending Commission Decision 98/371/EC concerning the animal health conditions and veterinary certifications for imports of fresh meat from certain European countries to take into account some aspects in relation with the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia (FYROM) (notified under document number C(1999) 4233) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 9 December 1999
amending Commission Decision 98/371/EC concerning the animal health conditions and veterinary certifications for imports of fresh meat from certain European countries to take into account some aspects in relation with the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia (FYROM)
(notified under document number C(1999) 4233)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(2000/19/EC)

main_body: Annex II of Decision 98/371/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
